name: Either a bug or in need of clarification: Zen & Wisdom
author: HipMaestro

posts.author: HipMaestro
posts.content:
I'm trying to build a zen archer but have come upon a stumbling block.

When I buff the archer with Owl's Wisdom, the modifier increases just fine to either +1 or +2 additional, but the attack bonus doesn't change. Yet if I equip either a +2 or +4 Wis ammy, the AB bumps up as would be expected.

So what's the deal here? Is this yet another burp on the character sheet or does zen archery treat temporary wisdom increases differently than permanent ones? I know from experience that when I buff with Cat's Grace on a standard dexer archer, the AB changes as it should. Confusing.

Temporary inconvenience, permanent improvement (I hope!).

posts.author: HipMaestro
posts.content:
No worries.

Just checked it with combat debugging and the Wisdom bump is being calculated properly. So here is another gliche on the character sheet to be aware of.

Back to the task at hand. Thanks for stopping by to read my ravings.

posts.author: KailPendragon
posts.content: Interesting, I never noticed this glitch. One more reason not to look at the character sheet, ah!
